name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: Unpopular opinion, but maybe the problem isn’t who did or didn’t vote, or how they did it. Maybe the problem is actually a system that grants nine people the power to decide what the rest of us are allowed to do with our own bodies.
content.value:
Unpopular opinion, but maybe the problem isn’t who did or didn’t vote, or how they did it.

Maybe the problem is actually a system that grants nine people the power to decide what the rest of us are allowed to do with our own bodies.
